air:Brand.air:Text: Attractive Fare inclusive of Meal, Seat, Flexibility to Change and lower Cancellation Fees

air:Brand.Name: Super 6E
air:Brand.air:Title: Super 6E
Super 6E
air:Brand.air:Text: Up your game with Super 6E. A one-shot deal that enhance your flying experience like nothing else.

Book with Super 6E fare to enjoy a host of complimentary benefits and services.
Key features: Zero convenience fee An extra 10KG baggage allowance over and above 30kgs of FBA.
Travel from India to US via IST, baggage allowance will be 2 piece of 23 Kgs each along with 8 kgs of Hand baggage. Travel from India to IST only baggage will remain 30Kgs as check in and 7 Hand Baggage.
One (1) additional piece of check-in baggage allowed on domestic sectors A free seat including XL seats A free snack combo of your choice (1 snack + 1 non-alcoholic beverage) Free express check-in and free priority boarding* Enjoy reduced cancellation fee of only INR 500 per passenger for domestic sector and INR 1500 per passenger for international sector. Enjoy complimentary no change fee till up to 4 days beyond domestic flight departure, and at a nominal fee of ₹500 or equiv within 3 days before domestic flight. International flyers can avail change fee till 4 days beyond departure at ₹500, and within 3 days before departure, at ₹900 or equiv.
• Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline, then the onboard product or service may be different to that described above. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
If changed/cancelled at least 4hrs before the scheduled departure for International sectors and at least 3 hrs before the scheduled departure for Domestic sectors. No-show charges will be levied if changed/cancelled within 4 hrs (International) and 3hrs (Domestic) from scheduled departure. Difference of fare will be applicable along with change fees.

SME
